author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION AS IT STARTS MOVING AWAY FROM SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH DISCONTINUED FOR THE COAST OF MEXICO...
summary: ...MARIO WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION AS IT STARTS MOVING AWAY FROM SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH DISCONTINUED FOR THE COAST OF MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Fri Sep 12 the center of Mario was located near 18.1, -104.6 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL DEPRESSION AS IT STARTS MOVING AWAY FROM SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH DISCONTINUED FOR THE COAST OF MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Fri Sep 12 the center of Mario was located near 18.1, -104.6 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Mario (EP3/EP132025)
